info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 2:59PM EDT until June 16 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Bladen County in southeastern North Carolina... Northeastern Columbus County in southeastern North Carolina... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 259 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Abbottsburg to near Rowan, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Whiteville, Elizabethtown, Rowan, Bladenboro, Lake Waccamaw, Sandyfield, Hallsboro, Redbug, Council, Riegelwood, Carvers, Abbottsburg, Lisbon, Lagoon, Elkton, Emerson, Kelly, Freeman, Delco and Brunswick. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
